name: Lincoln Memorial
description: "...as in the hearts of the people for whom he saved the Union, the memory of Abraham Lincoln is enshrined forever." Beneath these words, the 16th president of the United States sits immortalized in marble as an enduring symbol of unity, strength, and wisdom.
shortDescription: "...as in the hearts of the people for whom he saved the Union, the memory of Abraham Lincoln is enshrined forever." Beneath these words, the 16th president of the United States sits immortalized in m...

operatingHours.description: The Lincoln Memorial and other sites on the National Mall and Memorial Parks are always open to the public (other than the Washington Monument, which is open 9 am to 5 pm). Restrooms, museums and elevators close in the evenings (check individual sites for hours)

climate.weatherDescription: Washington, DC experiences all four seasons. Humidity will make the temps feel hotter in summer and colder in winter. Spring (March - May) Temp: Average high is 65.5 degrees with a low of 46.5 degrees Summer (June - August) Temp: Average high is 86 degrees with a low of 68.5 degrees Fall (September - November) Temp: Average high is 68 degrees with a low of 51.5 degrees Winter (December - February) Temp: Average high is 45 degrees with a low of 30 degrees (Source: www.usclimatedata.com)

images.title: Lincoln Memorial at Dusk
images.caption: One of the most photographed memorials, no matter the hour.

images.title: Nations Capital Landscape
images.caption: An iconic photo of the Nations Capital

images.title: Lincoln Memorial Statue at Night
images.altText: Marble statue of Abraham Lincoln sitting inside the Chamber of the Lincoln Memorial
images.caption: Statue of Abraham Lincoln sitting inside the Lincoln Memorial with a quote above "IN THIS TEMPLE AS IN THE HEARTS OF THE PEOPLE FOR WHOM HE SAVED THE UNION THE MEMORY OF ABRAHAM LINCOLN IS ENSHRINED FOREVER"

images.title: Lincoln Memorial at Sunset
images.altText: Lincoln Memorial view from plaza steps
images.caption: View of the Lincoln Memorial from the plaza steps during sunset.

images.title: Aerial View of the Lincoln Memorial
images.altText: A rectangular, white colonnaded building seen from the air
images.caption: Aerial view of the Lincoln Memorial

images.title: Lincoln Memorial statue
images.altText: Marble statue of a man sitting on a chair
images.caption: Daniel Chester French's statue of Abraham Lincoln is the central feature of the Lincoln Memorial and is comprised of 28 pieces of Georgia marble.
